EmailTemplate.name: Relese Title Hold Dealer Docs
EmailTemplate.subject: Lift Title Hold For {!Account.Dealership_ID__c} {!Account.Name}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello Titles,
{!Account.Name} has returned their dealer documents and we can now send any titles that may have been held.
Here is a link to the Account Record: {!Account.Link}
Thank you.
